Fits copula for input

Source: R/fitCopulaPop.R
fitCopulaPop.Rd

Fits copula for input

Usage

fitCopulaPop(
  sce,
  assay_use,
  input_data,
  marginal_list,
  family_use,
  copula = "gaussian",
  DT = TRUE,
  pseudo_obs = FALSE,
  epsilon = 1e-06,
  family_set = c("gaussian", "indep"),
  important_feature = "all",
  n_cores,
  parallelization = "mcmapply",
  BPPARAM = NULL
)
